resources.string:
Swap Face is a feature that can swap detected faces* in an image automatically.
 *Face detector in Swap Face is set to the highest, so it will only detect faces that met some requirements

 Step to Swap Face (1-6) :
 1) Select an image with faces in it
 2) KOMOK will detect faces in the image, the detection information can be seen in [A]
 3) - If no face is found, you need to replace the image with another image by using the [B] button
 - If found at least two faces, you will be able to duplicate faces and swap faces
 4) Press button [C] to duplicate or button [D] to swap, you can press repeatedly to adjust face swap
 5) Press button [E] to remove or add watermark to the image
 6) Now, you can save the swap results with button [F] or share the swap results with button [G]

Crop Face is a feature that can crop faces in an image automatically.

 Step to Crop Face (1-7) :
 1) Select an image with faces in it
 2) KOMOK will detect faces in the image, the detection information can be seen in [A]
 3) - If no face is found, you need to replace the image with another image by using the [B] button
 - If found at least one face, you will be able to crop the face
 4) Press button [C] to open options, to select which faces you do not want to crop or vice versa
 5) Press button [D] to change crop shape
 6) Slide slider [E] to resize crop shape
 7) Now, you can save the crop results with button [F]

Version 1.0 
 
Developed by Team C 
Mobile Computing UNJ
